starters.name: Vile Trident
starters.description: For any attack this Hero makes, he may take 1 Damnation to roll +1 die.

starters.name: Grimbolt
starters.description: If this deals any Wounds, this Hero may take 2 Damnation to deal 1 additional Wound.

starters.name: Lifebound
starters.description: Each Hit heals 1 Wound from this Hero or from one Ally Close to the target.
